name: check-user-phone-already-registred
description: Verifica se telefone já está cadastrado no firebase authentication

scripts.deploy-cloud-function: cd deploy && gcloud functions deploy checkUserPhoneAlreadyRegistred --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --entry-point checkUserPhoneAlreadyRegistred --region southamerica-east1 --allow-unauthenticated

author: Wellington Souza
